text: Aiglun is a commune in southeastern France. It is in the Alpes-de-Haute- Provence department in the Provence-Alpes-CÃ´te d'Azur region. In addition to the village, the town has three other hamlets: * Les Lavendes * Les Grees * Le Thoron == References == ==Other websites== Category:Communes in Alpes-de- Haute-Provence
